data.message: Rebuilt Lore Dashboard using DURO Design OS: V2 scored 30/30 (100%) vs V1's 25/30 (83%). Key fixes: declared mood sentence first, moved CTA to end of flow path (bottom-right), built strict Mondrian grid before adding breaks, named the intentional discord, designed avatar color sequence as explicit rhythm motif. Proves the OS works — process creates better outcomes than instinct alone.
